question.prompt: Which of the following statements is false?
question.choice: A: Like humans, XML elements can have two parents
B: XML's root element encompasses all of its other elements
C: XSL sheets are connected to the XML documen by adding an instruction in the XML document
D: Functions are provided to transform an XML element to a readable data form

question.prompt: An Ajax request invokes a callback that is used to display data and partially update the user interface
Select all types that is supported by JSON
What object does a client need to create to create and send a request to a server?
XSL sheets are used to convert XML into a text-based document
Which of the following statements is True?
question.choice: A: XML is a tree like structure. A parent can have multiple child elements
B: XML is portable used for data storage and exchange
C: XML parsers are used to identify components of XML documents
